QuestData.Title: The Full Prophecy
QuestData.Description: Dat snake of a prophet, Zul. I never trusted him. Always felt like he was never telling us de whole prophecy.$b$bEnter de Temple of dis "Prophet" and see if he recorded any of his visions.$b$bWe must learn of what our prey intends, before our real hunt may begin.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find and read the 3 Words of Zul.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report your findings to Wardruid Loti.

Objectives.Objective: The Word of Zul I read
The Word of Zul II read
The Word of Zul III read
